msbt.message: You know, for a while there, I was calling everyone "baby." My friends, my enemies, even my banker.

But lately I've been working on a new term of endearment. What do you think about "punkin"? Is it too romantic, or just romantic enough? Remember, I want to use this on EVERYONE. So, like, imagine me calling my boss "punkin." It just works, doesn't it?

But lately I've been working on a new term of endearment. What do you think about "buddy"? Like, hey buddy, how you doin'? Watch it there, buddy. C'mon, buddy. You get the picture. You think it sounds rude? But I'm literally calling you my buddy! Why am I so misunderstood, buddy?
But lately I've been working on a new term of endearment. What do you think about "uncle"? Now, I don't discriminate by gender. I'll call your grandma "uncle" if I have to, uncle!
OK, let Doctor prescribe the perfect activity for a huge group of friends
Going to an amusement park!I really like how upfront they are. The promise of amusement is literally a part of the name! And don't even get me started on the snacks. I just sold myself, !

I would have said the aquarium, butI'm banned from aquariums.Yeah, it's a worldwide ban, and no, I don't want to answer any questions about it!Let's just say it was in response to the "merman incident."

So, going to the movies is a good idea if you don't want to talk to anyone. And you can go with as big of a group as you want!The trick is convincing everyone to pay money to go see "The Attack of the Nuclear ."
You know what's an underrated skill? Being able to say ANYTHING and still sound cool.
For example "Would you like fries with that?" <10_5 />Boom, acting!
Like, check this out "I'd like to speak to the manager." Not bad, eh?
Lemme give you an example "I'm here for my dental cleaning."<10_4 /> Did you get chills?
Get ready for a demonstration "Did you get a haircut?" Absolutely riveting.
Lemme show off for you "The soup is room temperature."<10_4 /> It's an award-winning performance!
You see? If you put enough feeling into the delivery, the lines don't even matter!
Lately I've been having a really hard time falling asleep. My mind just keeps working overtime! I must be about to have a breakthrough idea!
Sowant to help me hone in on this great idea? I'll even cut you in10 percent!
Sowant to help me hone in on this great idea? I'll even cut you in10 percent!
Actually, you know what? I don't have an idea after all. I think I just need a new pillow.
C'mon, let's put our brains together and come up with something outrageously trendy. Likea designer ! Or a recipe for that tastes like ! Why are you making that face?
Hey, we can talk about anything, you know. AnythingEXCEPT my celebrity crushes. Nope. The various celebrities who have crushes on me want to keep things under wraps for now.
Look, I need 48 hours' notice for a press conference, OK? And please contact my agent next time!
Any rumors about me and any famous actresses are completely false and fabricated. Don't you think I'd let you know if I had a relationship with a famous actress?!
Oh, FINE. I guess I can spill a few tiny details
After all, it's not like anyone is gonna believe ME of all folks!
After all, a little talk never hurt anyone, right?Actually, now that I think about it, that is 100 percent incorrect.I retract any and all statements I may or may not have made!
Oh, what am I saying? This is the kind of stuff that could land me in the tabloids. I'd better not!
It might shock you to hear this, but folks are always coming to me for advice on their love life. And when they do, I always remind them
There are plenty of fish in the sea.Learn the name of every one and, if you're lucky, you might just reel in a marine biologist!
There's no such thing as a bad date. There's only great material for your future tell-all book!
Polka dots and stripes do NOT pair well. Hold the phoneSorry, that relates more to wardrobe faux pas than matters of the heart.
There's a pot for every lid.And a stove for every pot. And an oven for every stove. And a kitchen for every oven And the kitchen is the heart of every home, !
The most important relationship you'll ever have is with yourself.As long as you are kind and patient with yourself, you'll never be alone.
Maybe it's cliché, but sometimes it's just what you need to hear.
